input: Batch request to create a lock request and change the user status of an existing lock request.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankCustomerLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"PartyIdentifyingElements":{"PartyID":"310867"},"EventCode":"209000","UserStatusCode":"4","ValidityStartDate":"2023-10-17","ValidityEndDate":"2024-10-17","Note":"Lock due to suspected fraudulent activity."}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/120 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode":"5"}

--request-separator--
